org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.database

Class BGWDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.database.BGWDataBase

  • public class BGWDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the data base class for the project. It uses an SQLite database. This class handles all statement creation and the the IO functions.

      • getFilePath

        public java.lang.String getFilePath()
        Get the database file path.
        Returns:
        The database path or an empty string if it has not been saved.

      • openConnection

        public boolean openConnection(java.lang.String path)
        Open the connection to the Database.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the database to connect to.
        Returns:
        true if connection opened successfully, false otherwise.

      • closeConn

        public void closeConn()
        Close the connection. Closes the Connection and the Statement.

      • openFile

        public boolean openFile(BGWProject project)
        Open a file from from the database. This will prompt for the database path.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to load from the database.
        Returns:
        True if the project was opened, false for cancel.

      • openFile

        public boolean openFile(BGWProject project,
                        java.lang.String path)
        Open a file from an SQLite DB..
        Parameters:
        project - The project to open from the database.
        path - PAth of the database to open.
        Returns:
        True if File was successfully loaded.

      • resetOpenFlags

        public void resetOpenFlags()
        Resets the open flags so the database assumes it is a blank file. This is used after opening the default file.

      • libraryDeleteBicycle

        public void libraryDeleteBicycle(Bicycle bicycle,
                                 int id)
        Library method to remove a bicycle. This removes the main owner entry (bicycles list) and all the associated components.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle to delete - used for table reference.
        id - Id of the owner table entry (bicycles list - this id appears as owner_id in components).

      • libraryImportBicycle

        public void libraryImportBicycle(Bicycle bicycle,
                                 int id)
        Library method to Load a Bicycle.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle to Load
        id - The id of the Bicycle to import.

      • libraryInsertBicycle

        public void libraryInsertBicycle(Bicycle bicycle)
        Library method to add a Bicycle.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The Bicycle to write to the database.

                                    int id)
        Load an AttributeSet from the library database.
        Parameters:
        attSet - The AttributeSet to load.
        id - The id of the record.

        Save the file.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to save.
        Returns:
        True if the write was carried out, false if canceled or write error.

      • writeFile

        public boolean writeFile(BGWProject project)
        Write the current file to the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        project - The project to save.
        Returns:
        True if the write was successful, false if it failed.

      • prepareBicycleTablesNew

        public void prepareBicycleTablesNew(Bicycle bicycle)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Prepare the Bicycle tables. This creates the table if it doesn't exist, and/or deletes all the records from the table.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle to use as a template for the table names.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Exception thrown on database error.

      • openAsLibrary

        public boolean openAsLibrary(java.lang.String path)
        Simple open as Library - opens the db provided in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the library database.
        Returns:
        True if the library is opened, false if it fails to open.

      • librarySaveComponent

        public void librarySaveComponent(BaseComponent component)
        Library method to save a component from it's attribute set.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to save.

      • libraryRemoveComponent

        public void libraryRemoveComponent(java.lang.String tableName,
                                   int id)
        Remove a Library Component
        Parameters:
        tableName - Table to remove component from.
        id - The id of the record to remove.

      • getComponentLibraryList

        public java.util.ArrayList<ComponentRecord> getComponentLibraryList(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                    int queryOwnerId)
        Get the list of Component records for a component in the library. This requires tweak for bicycles vs components. Bicycle tables (not bicycle list table) will always have an owner id of other than -1. Components that have been exported will always have an owner id of -1 (no owner id).
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to get the list from.
        queryOwnerId - The ownerID. If this is no owner id (-1), it will filter components that do not belong to a bicycle.
        Returns:
        The list of component records for the table.
